version_description:
Hey there. With a new year, comes new features! Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] The app can now help you transition from 2019 taxes to 2020. There's nothing quite like a fresh start!
- [New] California Residents: You can view the California Privacy Notice at anytime in the main menu
- [Improved] The indi tax calculation, which helps your figure out how much to save for taxes, has been updated for 2020.
- [Fixed] iPhone status bar does not display correctly in dark mode

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy New Year, and happy banking!

- The indi team

Hey there. With a new year, comes new features! Here’s what you’ll find in this update:

- [New] The app can now help you transition from 2019 taxes to 2020.
- [New] CA Residents: You can view the California Privacy Notice at any time in the main menu.
- [Improved] The indi tax calculation, which helps your figure out how much to save for taxes, has been updated for 2020.
- Squashed a few bugs.

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy New Year!
- The indi team

Hey there. We want to share indi with everyone we can, so we're removing the waitlist. Here's what's in this update:

- [New] You no longer need a waitlist code to apply for an indi account. Anyone can download the app and get the most out of indi!

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.

Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there! We're adding a feature to help users get started with their indi account. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] View a list of actions to take to get the most out of your indi account
- [New] View a short list of recent transactions on the home screen
- [Improved] Access better information on cash deposit and withdrawal locations

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com. Happy banking!

- The indi team

Receipt Capture is here! Let's get down to the details:

- [New] Add a receipt image to a transaction, using your phone's camera or photo gallery
- [New] View receipt images you've added to transactions on the transaction details screen
- [New] Remove and delete receipt images from transactions

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.

Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there! Need a form to setup direct deposit? We've got you covered. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] Download a direct deposit form, accessed via "Account & Routing Numbers" in the menu

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com. Happy banking! - The indi team

Hey there! We've made some improvements to the app. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [Improved] Updated main navigation menu so you can find features more easily

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy banking!

- The indi team

Hey there! We fixed up a few bugs. Here's some of what we took care of:

- [Fixed] The PIN change feature wasn't working for some users

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy banking!

- The indi team

Hey there! Here's a few changes we wanted you all to have:

- [New] Receipt icons on your activity screen, so you know what transactions have uploaded receipts
- [Improved] Design improvements to make the app easier and more fun to use

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.

Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there! Categorizing transactions just got easier, and we've added other new features. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] Swipe transactions on a listing screen to categorize as Business or Personal.
- [New] Allocate money between your Okay to Spend and Tax Savings
- [New] Add and manage custom businesses in your business profile
- [Fixed] Some international transaction fees were not displaying correctly in the app

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com. Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there! We're always working hard to make improvements to indi. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] Transactions now estimate how much that work expense could save you off your taxes. Check it out on a transaction details screen for any deductible work expense.

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com. Happy banking! - The indi team

Hey there! We're always working hard to make improvements to indi. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [Fixed] Some users encountered an error when adding an account for transfers

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy banking!

- The indi team

Hey there! We're always looking for ways to improve indi. Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [New] Links in some of our emails will be able to take you directly to the right spot in the indi app.

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy banking!

- The indi team

Hey there! Here's what you'll find in this update:

- [Improved] Setting up a Tax Savings Goal is now optional when you sign-up for an indi account.
- [Improved] When entering your email address, we'll check for typos to help ensure we can communicate with you.

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com.
Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there!

Just fixing a few bugs. Nothing to see here.

Have questions? You can always email us at support@goindi.com. Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there, thanks for using indi! Here's what you'll see in this update:

- [Fixed] Monthly Statements now load within the app for all users.
- [Improved] See which features are restricted while your card is frozen.
- [Improved] Guidance on password security.

Happy banking!
- The indi team

Hey there! Just a quick fix this update:

- [Fixed] Resolved an issue that caused menu items to be inaccessible for some users.

Happy banking!
- The indi team
